comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when opening attached design 
file. Tested in Eclipse Version 3.1.

Steps to reproduce:
Open attached design file.

Actual result: NullPointerException is thrown out.

The attachment file is overdue, you can find that some oda-data-set's element 
has not the attribute of "extensionID".So the datatype value is null from 
module. But in fact, if the "extensionID" is null, module should set it a non-
null value or show the error messages.

It seems that DTE should add error handling if null or invalid extensionID is 
encountered.

The cause is that data set type is null. So we add the check on the validity 
of the data set type. When the date set in null or invalid, an error message 
will be thrown out.
